body_html: +1 to @vrv. I think part of the reason it was "convenient" to have this is to paper over import issues for the various input_data modules. We could consider moving these to tf.contrib (or shoehorn them into skflow's dataset support).
body_text: +1 to @vrv. I think part of the reason it was "convenient" to have this is to paper over import issues for the various input_data modules. We could consider moving these to tf.contrib (or shoehorn them into skflow's dataset support).
body: +1 to @vrv. I think part of the reason it was "convenient" to have this is to paper over import issues for the various `input_data` modules. We could consider moving these to `tf.contrib` (or shoehorn them into skflow's dataset support).
